Flash img3 files from a booted OS..

= Introduction =

Please download the package (spirit2pwn_r2.zip) and follow the instructions here: http://msftguy.blogspot.com/2010/06/old-bootrom-spirit-40-jb.html

Package only compatible with 3GS 3.1.3 fw (patch locations are hard-coded).

= Details =

Usage: img3flasher llb.img3 img3 files
